text: Paulo Victor Costa Soares (born 13 September 1994) is a Brazilian footballer who plays for Phnom Penh Crown in the Cambodian League. ==Club career== Paulo Victor began playing football América Futebol Clube (RN)'s youth system. He played professionally with Goyang Zaicro FC in Korea during 2016, before joining Nacional Atlético Clube (MG) in January 2018. In 2019, Soares signed for Phnom Penh Crown FC in the Cambodian League, and made his debut against Boeung Ket FC in the first game of the season when he scored his first goal for the club despite his team going down 3:2. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Living people Category:1994 births Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Goyang Zaicro FC players Category:Expatriate footballers in Cambodia Category:Phnom Penh Crown FC players Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:Brazilian expatriate sportspeople in South Korea Category:Brazilian expatriate sportspeople in Cambodia Category:Expatriate footballers in South Korea
title: Paulo Victor Costa Soares
